title: Software Developer
description:
**About Aeris Communications Inc.**
 For more than three decades, Aeris has been a trusted cellular IoT leader enabling the biggest IoT programs and opportunities across Automotive, Utilities and Energy, Fleet Management and Logistics, Medical Devices, and Manufacturing. Our IoT technology expertise serves a global ecosystem of 7,000 enterprise customers and 30 mobile network operator partners, and 90 million IoT devices across the world. Aeris powers today‚Äôs connected smart world with innovative technologies and borderless connectivity that simplify management, enhance security, optimize performance, and drive growth.
   

  

**Description**
 Design, document and implement Network Functions of a cloud\\-based 3GPP compliant 5G SA home network. Generate accurate schedule estimates. Provide progress updates in a daily stand up meeting, and deliver tested software in a predictable manner. Collaborate actively with the tech lead and other team members.
   

  

**Desired Domain Experience**
 3GPP Cellular Network Standards
   

  

 2G/3G \\- SS7
   

  

 4G \\- Diameter
   

  

 5G SA
   

  

 RADIUS
   

  

 SMS, SMPP
   

  

 VoLTE
   

  

****API Development \\& Security****
 Oath2
   

  

 PKI
   

  

 mTLS, SSL
   

  

 IP networks: packet inspection, routing, IP allocation \\& assignment, subnets, CIDR specification, IPV6
   

  

**Development Skills**
 Required (3\\-5 years)
   

  

 Java
   

  

 Database (MySQL, Oracle, Cassandra, Redis (at least one)
   

  

 pcap/wireshark/tcpdump
   

  

 Git source control
   

  

**Desirable**
 Spring Boot Docker/Containers/Kubernetes C/C\\+\\+
   

  

**Education**
 BS or higher degree in Computer Science or equivalent

title: SDE-2 (TypeScript, Python, Node.js)
description:
**Role:** 
 Software Engineer (2\\+ years of exp)
 



**Location:** 
 Gurgaon (on\\-site) 5 days WFO
 



**Employment type:** 
 Full\\-time
 



**Tech Stack:** 
 Typescript, Node.js, Python
 



  





**Company Overview:** 




  





**Our client** 
 is revolutionising the gaming landscape as India‚Äôs first G\\-Commerce startup, bridging the gap between virtual achievements and real\\-world value. We empower gamers by transforming their in\\-game currencies and XP into tangible rewards, from exclusive brand discounts to physical goods, lowering cart values and making gaming more rewarding than ever.
 



  





 Through strategic partnerships with game developers and top\\-tier brands, we create seamless white\\-labeled reward ecosystems, integrated directly into games and gaming platforms. Our mission? To redefine engagement by turning every play session into an opportunity for players to earn, redeem, and experience more.
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




  





 We are looking for a
 **Backend\\-Heavy SDE\\-2** 
 who is more than just a coder; we are looking for an
 **"Engineer\\-Owner"** 
 . In this role, you won't just close tickets, you will own entire product lines and experimental projects from "paper architecture" to production deployment.
 



  





**What You Will Do:** 




  




* **Architect from Scratch:** 
 Translate ambiguous product requirements into technical specifications and system designs on paper before writing a single line of code.
* **Dual\\-Stack Development:** 
 Build high\\-throughput API gateways and real\\-time services in
 **TypeScript/Node.js (NestJS)** 
 and handle complex business logic, data processing, or ML\\-driven reward engines in
 **Python (FastAPI/Django)** 
 .
* **Scale for Millions:** 
 Optimise backend systems to handle peak loads exceeding 2,500\\+ QPS, ensuring that reward distributions are idempotent and fault\\-tolerant.
* **Infrastructure Ownership:** 
 Use CI/CD best practices to package code via Docker and deploy to optimal AWS architectures using Kubernetes (K8S).
* **Mentorship:** 
 Act as a force multiplier by training interns and SDE\\-1s, distributing workloads, and conducting rigorous code reviews.
* **Performance Engineering:** 
 Identify bottlenecks in the system and implement caching strategies (Redis) or database optimisations (SQL/Prisma) to reduce API load times and latency.



  





**What We Are Looking For:** 




  




* **Verified Experience:** 
 Minimum 2 years of full\\-time professional experience.
* **Dual\\-Stack Mastery:** 
 Professional\\-level proficiency in both
 **TypeScript** 
 and
 **Python** 
 . You must have shipped production\\-grade code in both languages, not just "listed" them as skills.
* **Agency \\& Ownership:** 
 A proven track record of taking a feature from inception to production with minimal oversight.
* **System Design Depth:** 
 Deep understanding of distributed systems, message queues (Kafka/RabbitMQ), and database modelling (SQL vs. NoSQL).
* **AI\\-Native Workflow:** 
 Proficiency in using modern AI\\-assisted agents (Cursor, Copilot) to accelerate development while maintaining the skill to debug complex AI\\-generated bugs.
* **Educational Background:** 
 Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science or a related field.



  





**Technical Mandate:** 




  




* **Languages:** 
 TypeScript, Node.js (NestJS), Python (FastAPI/Django).
* **Databases:** 
 PostgreSQL (Prisma/Drizzle), Redis, MongoDB.
* **Cloud/DevOps:** 
 AWS (Lambda, EC2, RDS, Step Functions), Docker, K8S, GitHub Actions.
* **Observability:** 
 Grafana, Prometheus, or CloudWatch.

 Academy of Computer Learning (ACL) is a growing organization specializing in computer education and technological training. Based in Goraya, Punjab, India, ACL is committed to fostering learning and innovation for students and professionals alike. With a focus on enhancing technical skills, the company aims to build a skilled workforce equipped to meet the demands of the evolving tech industry. ACL provides a supportive environment for career growth and professional development.

Daily tasks include coding, debugging, implementing web applications, optimizing web functionality, and ensuring design consistency across platforms. Collaboration with cross\\-functional teams will be essential to achieve project goals and deadlines.

* Strong skills in Web Development and Web Design
* Solid understanding of programming concepts and problem\\-solving skills
* Ability to work effectively in a hybrid model, with solid time management skills to handle remote and in\\-office tasks
* Excellent teamwork and communication abilities
* Familiarity with responsive and mobile\\-first design principles is an advantage
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field is preferred

title: Full-Stack Software Engineer - Healthcare Integration Platform Full-Stack Software Engineer - Healthcare Integration Platform
description:
**Full\\-Stack Software Engineer (TypeScript) \\- Healthcare Integration Platform (Dental now, medical next)**
**About the role** 

  





 We are hiring a pragmatic, high\\-ownership Full\\-Stack Software Engineer to help build and scale a mission\\-critical healthcare integration platform. Today, we integrate with multiple dental practice management systems (PMS) and payer workflows to automate insurance eligibility, claims processing, and payment posting. Next, we will expand the same platform patterns into other medical PMS/EHR ecosystems.
 



  





 If you like real\\-world systems, messy integrations, and shipping value (not just debating architecture), you will fit right in.
 



  





  




**What you will do** 

  





**Integration engineering (core of the job)** 




  




* Maintain and extend integrations with multiple dental PMS platforms (and later medical PMS/EHRs)
* Sync patients, appointments, insurance plans, claims, and payments reliably across systems
* Troubleshoot vendor changes, inconsistent APIs, and legacy database quirks



  





**Payer automation and verification** 



* Build and maintain browser automation for insurance portals (eligibility checks, claim status, etc.)
* Handle MFA/OTP flows, session management, rate limiting, and UI changes that break scrapers
* Improve reliability in headless environments and production queue workflows



**Claims and revenue cycle workflows** 



* Implement claim scrubbing logic and rules\\-driven processing
* Extract data from EOBs and PDFs using OCR and document parsing
* Parse and validate EDI/X12 transactions (835/837\\) and reconcile posting into PMS systems



**Platform and product work** 



* Build and improve internal web UI for operations teams (work queues, status views, audit trails)
* Add new API endpoints, build migrations, improve observability, and support production operations
* Optimize SQL and performance for high\\-throughput, multi\\-tenant scenarios



  




**Tech stack (current)** 
* Backend: Node.js, TypeScript, Express
* Frontend: React 18, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind
* Database: PostgreSQL (including performance\\-focused SQL usage)
* Cloud: AWS services plus modern document/OCR tooling
* Automation: Puppeteer/Playwright\\-style browser automation and cloud browser orchestration
* AI: LLM\\-assisted workflows for structured extraction and claim intelligence



  




**What we are looking for (must\\-have)** 
* 4\\+ years building production systems in TypeScript/JavaScript (Node.js backend)
* Strong SQL skills (joins, CTEs, performance tuning, data integrity thinking)
* Solid React experience (hooks, component architecture, state management)
* Experience integrating external systems and APIs (auth, retries, error handling)
* Web automation/scraping experience (Puppeteer, Playwright, or similar)
* Strong Git hygiene and comfort working in an existing codebase



  





  




**Strongly preferred** 
* Healthcare workflows familiarity (eligibility, claims, EOBs, payment posting)
* Experience with legacy system integration (older databases, vendor\\-specific quirks)
* OCR/document processing experience (PDFs, tables, extraction pipelines)
* Queue processing patterns (idempotency, retry logic, concurrency control)
* EDI/X12 experience (835/837\\)


**The mindset that wins here** 
* You can embrace complexity without panicking (some modules are big and integration\\-heavy)
* You know when to refactor vs patch (pragmatism beats perfection)
* You debug like a detective (across PMS, our platform, payer portals, and back)


**Why this is interesting** 
* Real business impact: your work directly reduces manual effort and increases collections
* Complex technical surface area: integrations, automation, OCR, EDI, multi\\-tenant scaling
* Clear roadmap: dental PMS expansion first, then broader medical PMS/EHR coverage
* Equity ownership in the company


**How to apply** 

**Send your LinkedIn profile \\+ a short note on:** 



* A hard integration you shipped
* A scraper/automation you made resilient
* A production bug you chased across multiple systems



  





**(And yes, you can include the story where the vendor changed their UI overnight. We have support group meetings for that.)** 



* **PS: This is a high\\-ownership, high\\-output environment. We move fast, ship continuously, and prioritize customer impact over comfort. If you want a role where you can switch off at 5pm every day, this won‚Äôt be a fit. Don't apply.**

title: Software Engineer- (React & React Native Developer)
description:
**Role Overview:** 




  





 As a React \\& React Native Developer (2‚Äì3 years‚Äô experience), you will collaborate with UI/UX designers, backend engineers, and product owners to architect, develop, and maintain both web and mobile codebases. You‚Äôll be instrumental in translating designs into pixel\\-perfect interfaces, optimizing performance, and ensuring robust offline and real\\-time data handling
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




  





 ‚óè Component Development
 



  





 ‚óã Create modular, reusable UI components in React and React Native.
 



 ‚óã Translate Figma/Sketch designs into pixel\\-perfect layouts.
 



  





 ‚óè API Integration
 



  





 ‚óã Consume RESTful and GraphQL services with error handling, caching, and retry logic for offline support.
 



 ‚óã Implement JWT token management and robust data synchronization.
 



  





 ‚óè Performance \\& Optimization
 



  





 ‚óã Profile and optimize rendering (e.g., FlatList/SectionList), bundle size, and network calls.
 



 ‚óã Apply code\\-splitting, lazy loading, and Redux performance tuning.
 



  





 ‚óè Testing \\& QA
 



  





 ‚óã Author unit and integration tests with Jest and React Testing Library.
 



 ‚óã Build end\\-to\\-end suites using Cypress/Playwright for web and Detox/Appium for mobile.
 



  





 ‚óè CI/CD \\& Releases
 



  





 ‚óã Configure pipelines (GitHub Actions, CircleCI, Jenkins) and mobile delivery (Fastlane for TestFlight/App Store \\& Play Store).
 



 ‚óã Manage versioning, branching strategies, and release notes.
 



  





 ‚óè Collaboration \\& Support
 



  





 ‚óã Participate in Agile ceremonies, sprint planning, and peer code reviews.
 



 ‚óã Monitor production issues via Sentry/Bugsnag, analyze logs, and deploy hotfixes.
 



  





**Required Qualifications:** 




  





 ‚óè React \\& React Native Expertise
 



  





 ‚óã Deep understanding of component lifecycle, reconciliation, Hooks (useReducer, useMemo, useCallback), and Context API.
 



  





 ‚óè State Management
 



  





 ‚óã Proficient with Redux Toolkit (slices, middleware), MobX, or Recoil.
 



  





 ‚óè Styling
 



  





 ‚óã Experience with CSS\\-in\\-JS (styled\\-components, Emotion), Tailwind CSS, or BEM.
 



  





 ‚óè Mobile App Delivery
 



  





 ‚óã iOS and Android build processes, provisioning profiles, and App Store/TestFlight/Google Play deployments.
 



  





 ‚óè Native Module Integration
 



  





 ‚óã Bridging in Objective\\-C/Swift and Java/Kotlin for custom functionality.
 



  





 ‚óè Performance Tuning
 



  





 ‚óã JS thread profiling, memory leak detection, and efficient list rendering strategies.
 



  





 ‚óè Modern JavaScript \\& TypeScript
 



  





 ‚óã ESNext features (async/await, dynamic imports, proxies) and strong TS skills (generics, discriminated unions,
 



 mapped types).
 



  





 ‚óè Tooling \\& Linting
 



  





 ‚óã Custom ESLint rules, Prettier, Husky, and lint\\-staged for code quality enforcement.
 



  





 ‚óè Testing Frameworks
 



  





 ‚óã Jest with coverage thresholds, React Testing Library best practices, and E2E tools (Cypress/Playwright, Detox/Appium).
 



  





 ‚óè Monitoring \\& Analysis
 



  





 ‚óã Lighthouse audits, bundle\\-analyzer, and error tracking with Sentry or Bugsnag.
 



  





 ‚óè Data Storage \\& Offline
 



  





 ‚óã AsyncStorage, MMKV, SQLite/Realm, and conflict resolution sync patterns.
 



  





 ‚óè Build \\& Bundler
 



  





 ‚óã Webpack and Metro customizations, tree\\-shaking, and code splitting.
 



  





 ‚óè CI/CD \\& DevOps Basics
 



  





 ‚óã Familiarity with GitHub Actions, CircleCI/Jenkins, Fastlane, and Docker. Kubernetes knowledge is a plus.
 



  





 ‚óè Version Control \\& Monorepo
 



  





 ‚óã Advanced Git (merge/rebase), Lerna or Yarn Workspaces.
 



  





 ‚óè Agile Practices
 



  





 ‚óã Backlog grooming, estimation (Planning Poker), and JIRA/Azure DevOps.
 



  





**Preferred Experience:** 




  





 ‚óè Google Maps APIs, KML exports, and geospatial visualizations.
 



 ‚óè Flask or Node.js backend collaboration.
 



 ‚óè Docker and Kubernetes orchestration

title: EngOps .Net - Full Stack - Senior Developer C# DOTNET
description:
EngOps .Net \\- Full Stack \\- Senior Developer
   

  

 REMOTE
   

  

 Senior .NET Engineer
   

  

 We‚Äôre looking for a hands\\-on Senior .NET Engineer to help design, build, and deliver high\\-quality, scalable enterprise SaaS applications. This role is ideal for someone who enjoys solving complex problems, writing clean code, and taking full ownership of their work‚Äîincluding testing and quality.
   

  

 What You‚Äôll Be Doing
   

  

 Break down large or complex problems into smaller parts, design clean solutions, and implement the core framework.
   

  

 Build and maintain RESTful APIs and backend services using C\\#, .NET Core, Entity Framework, and Web API.
   

  

 Apply software architecture patterns like Domain\\-Driven Design (DDD) and CQRS to build modular and scalable systems.
   

  

 Work directly with SQL Server‚Äîdesigning databases, writing stored procedures, optimizing queries, and tuning performance.
   

  

 Use Entity Framework (EF Core or EF6\\) for ORM and data access.
   

  

 Write clean, testable, and maintainable code with proper documentation.
   

  

 Take full ownership of testing your own code‚Äîunit, integration, and performance testing‚Äîas part of a Shift Left / No QA team setup.
   

  

 Collaborate with product managers and other teams to understand requirements and deliver customer\\-focused features.
   

  

 Use AI development tools (required)‚Äîincluding GitHub Copilot, Claude, or similar‚Äîto assist with code generation, refactoring, documentation, and development speed.
   

  

 What You Should Bring
   

  

 5\\+ years of experience in enterprise or SaaS software development.
   

  

**Strong Hands\\-on Experience With**
 C\\#, .NET Core, Web API
   

  

 Angular or other frontend frameworks.
   

  

 Entity Framework (EF Core or EF6\\)
   

  

 SQL Server ‚Äì writing queries, stored procedures, indexing, and performance tuning
   

  

 Solid understanding of object\\-oriented programming, design patterns, and enterprise architecture.
   

  

 Experience with DDD, CQRS, and clean layering of business logic and data access.
   

  

 Familiarity with multi\\-threading, asynchronous programming, and system performance tuning.
   

  

 Comfortable with Git and working in a modern development environment (CI/CD, Agile).
   

  

 Strong debugging and troubleshooting skills.
   

  

 Excellent communication skills (written and verbal) in English.
   

  

 Experience working across multiple teams or squads.
   

  

 Required: Active daily use of AI development tools like GitHub Copilot, Claude, or similar in your workflow.

title: Senior Application Specialist OTC
description:
IMEA (India, Middle East, Africa)
   

  

 India
   

  

 LIXIL INDIA PVT LTD
   

  

 Employee Assignment
   

  

 Fully remote possible
   

  

 Full Time
   

  

 7 December 2025
   

  

**Position Title** 
 : Senior Application Specialist OTC
 **Department** 
 : IT/Digital ‚Äì OTC
   

  

**Career Path Level:** 
 Senior Reports to: Workstream Leader
   

  

**Position Purpose**
 The Senior Application specialist plays a key role in ensuring the stability, quality, and strategic evolution of IT systems and processes. With significant experience and deep domain knowledge, the Senior Application specialist takes ownership of complex technical or functional areas, mentors less experienced colleagues, and drives solution design and continuous improvement initiatives. This role serves as a bridge between operational execution and architectural thinking, providing leadership within projects and a trusted point of contact for business or technical counterparts.
   

  

**Position Summary:** 
 As a Senior Application specialist, you are a recognized expert in your IT domain. You independently manage and deliver complex initiatives, resolve critical issues, and ensure that solutions align with business needs and IT standards. Your work is both hands\\-on and strategic: balancing delivery with system improvement, business engagement, and peer development. Collaboration across functions, regions, and stakeholder groups is essential to your role.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Take proactive ownership of complex system areas, developments, or processes with minimal supervision within your area of expertise, cross functionally and together with internal and external stakeholders.
* Serve as subject matter expert in your domain; provide advanced support and solution guidance
* Design, implement, and optimize processes or system changes aligned with strategic goals and based on business objectives, user needs, and regulatory requirements.
* Mentor and support junior and mid\\-level colleagues through structured guidance and coaching.
* Actively contribute to project planning, scoping, and design activities; represent IT in business\\-facing discussions.
* Ensure adherence to industry and system standards, documentation, and compliance requirements.


**General Requirements**
* Master‚Äôs degree in System Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field
* Minimum of eight years hands\\-on experience in your field of expertise.
* Proven ability to lead complex initiatives independently, such as large scale projects and drive results.
* Demonstrated leadership in process improvement, problem\\-solving, or technical advancement.
* Strong communication skills in English, both verbal and written; able to clearly convey technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Ability to collaborate effectively in cross\\-functional and international teams.
* Can support and mentor others and contribute to team development and knowledge sharing. Growth Expectations:


 Senior Application specialists are expected to demonstrate influence beyond their immediate team, consistently deliver high\\-quality outcomes, and take initiative in strategic or cross\\-team programs. Growth from Senior to Solution Architect is marked by a shift from deep expertise to broader architectural vision, proactive business engagement, and a leadership role in shaping future IT solutions.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description:
**Software Internship \\- LegalTech Platform (Remote)** 




 Location: Bangalore, India (Remote)
 



 Duration: 2‚Äì3 months \\| Outstanding performers may transition to full\\-time roles
 



 Stipend: Competitive, commensurate with experience and contribution
 



 Start Date: Immediate / Rolling admissions
 



  





**About LegalBridge** 




 LegalBridge is building the operating system for U.S. immigration law. We help attorneys, law firms, and global mobility teams manage complex cases like O\\-1, EB\\-1A, and EB\\-2 NIW with clarity and speed.
 



 Our platform combines AI\\-powered tools, automation, and smart workflows to transform legal operations. We‚Äôre not a law firm \\- we‚Äôre a legaltech startup solving one of the most complex areas of professional services.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 We‚Äôre looking for a Software Intern to join our product and engineering team. This role is about building and improving the tools that power LegalBridge: case dashboards, AI\\-driven drafting features, document workflows, and more.
 



 As a Software Intern, you‚Äôll get to work on real product features and learn how to design scalable, user\\-friendly systems in a startup environment.
 



  





**What You‚Äôll Do** 




 Contribute to frontend and backend development of the LegalBridge platform.
 



 Build and test features such as AI\\-assisted drafting, case dashboards, and client portals.
 



 Collaborate with product and design teams to create clean, intuitive UI/UX.
 



 Optimize workflows for speed, accuracy, and scalability.
 



 Debug, test, and maintain code across different modules.
 



  





**Ideal Candidate** 




 Student in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or recent graduate).
 



 Proficient in at least one modern programming language (JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, or similar).
 



 Familiar with web frameworks (React, Node.js, or Django/Flask).
 



 Curious about AI, SaaS, or legaltech applications.
 



 Eager to learn, adapt, and solve problems in a startup environment.
 



  





**Core Competencies** 




 Code quality ‚Äì write maintainable, scalable, and efficient solutions.
 



 Detail orientation ‚Äì spot issues before they hit production.
 



 Problem\\-solving ‚Äì break down complex challenges into workable code.
 



 Adaptability ‚Äì learn quickly and iterate fast.
 



 Collaboration ‚Äì work smoothly with cross\\-functional teams.
 



  





**Differentiators** 




 Why join LegalBridge as a Software Intern?
 



 Work on a live SaaS platform used by attorneys and case teams.
 



 Build features that directly impact real users and clients.
 



 Learn how AI integrates into legal and business workflows.
 



 Experience the startup journey in legaltech \\- fast, challenging, and rewarding.
 



  





**Work Mode** 




 Hybrid structure: remote flexibility \\+ in\\-person sessions at our Delhi base.
 



 Work culture: collaborative, output\\-driven, startup\\-paced.
 



 Tools that make teamwork simple and transparent.
 



  





**What You‚Äôll Gain** 




 Hands\\-on experience in full\\-stack software development.
 



 Training in AI\\-driven applications and SaaS workflows.
 



 Mentorship from experienced engineers and product leads.
 



 Certificate \\+ Letter of Recommendation.
 



 Consideration for a long\\-term role at LegalBridge based on performance.
